overview: Craig is the visionary of Nixle, LLC. Craig held the position of Founder and Chief Executive Officer of the Company from its inception through December 2010. His experience stems from a 17-year history of accomplishments in both the legal and business sectors. He received his law degree from George Washington University. He began his career as an Assistant Prosecutor in two separate counties in the state of New Jersey as well as acting as a certified instructor of law and procedure at two police academies. After leaving the public sector, he entered the private sector as a practicing attorney and ultimately became an on-air analyst contracted by Fox Television Stations Group, Fox News Channel, CBS and Fox Radio Network. Craig graduated from Emory University with a bachelor in business administration with concentrations in Finance and Marketing. His leadership experience includes work for the Office of President Jimmy Carter in Atlanta, Georgia, on Carterâ€™s Presidential Library project. Craig also sat on the Council of State Governments Public Safety and Justice Task Force.
